modName: Facetint files of Dremora follower for KOFFEYKID
summary: This file contains only facetint files for Dremora Follower
descriptionHtml:
Facetint files for \"Dremora follower for KOFFEYKID\"

Dremora follower for KOFFEYKID is a follower mod made by RitchieTheMerc.
It adds an dremora NPC as a follower at Omnious Sewer beside Riverwood Bridge.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9675

**UFO compatible with new follower mods**
You need to load UFO last with using Skyrim Lancher.
like this 
========
?DremoraFollower.esp
?UFO.esp
========

I have traveled with Dremora Follower for a long time.
He is enough cool, even he does not have facetint files.
But I prefer he has it.
I asked RitchieTheMerc about customization of Dremora Follower and was granted a permission.
So that I decided to upload this small tweak files for Dremora Follower.
Thank you for the cool mod, RitchieTheMerc.
When you mind about this file, you can tell me anytime and I will delete it:)

Because of I use younger face textures and no more blocky faces, he might look different from his appearance in vanilla skyrim.

>>What dose facetint files do?
prevent to be grey face

>>How to use it?
Download and install original Dremora Follower.
Put DremoraFollower.bsa into your Skyrim/Data folder and play Skyrim.
When facetint files do not work, delete the bsa file.
After deleting the bsa file, put Meshes and Textures into Skyrim/Data folder directly.
author: Sifka
